mapper.insert: insert into resmanage(resno, resname, resimage, ressize, reslocation, resoriginalimage, rkNo, ressubdesc) values(resno_seq.nextval, #{resName}, #{resImage}, #{resSize}, #{resLocation}, #{resOriginalImage}, #{rkNo}, #{resSubdesc})
mapper.select: select * from ( select * from v_resreserve where (rvend >to_date(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and rvend < to_date(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')+1) or (rvstart > to_date(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and rvstart < to_date(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')+1) or (rvstart < to_date(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and rvend >= to_date(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')+1) ) where resno=#{resNo} order by rvstart
select A.* from( select rvno, resno, rvstart from v_resreserve where resNo=#{resNo} and rvstart > to_date(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:Mi') order by rvstart)A where rownum = 1
